name: Bracers of the First Men
flavorText: “I do not care if these were forged in long dead furnaces by the Ancients themselves. They help me crush my enemies; that is all that matters.” -Aletur of Sescheron
flavorTextHtml: “I do not care if these were forged in long dead furnaces by the Ancients themselves. They help me crush my enemies; that is all that matters.” -Aletur of Sescheron

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Hammer of the Ancients attacks 50% faster and deals 445% increased damage. (Barbarian Only) [375 - 500]%
